modelCorrections.rawOutput:
- Thought: To make the HTML code accessible according to WCAG 2.1 guidelines, I need to add the "lang" attribute to the <html> tag to specify the language of the content.
- Observation: The extracted text "5Pillars" does not provide a clear indication of the language used on the website. However, assuming that the content is in English due to the absence of any language-specific characters or words, I will proceed with adding English as the language.
- Action: Add [lang="en"] to the HTML.
- Corrected HTML: <html lang="en" prefix="og: http://ogp.me/ns#" class=" td-md-is-chrome">
